name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>重<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>武<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>者<rt>しゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>装<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>留<rt>る</rt></ruby>ガイア・ブースター

text.en: You can target 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to that target. It is treated as a Tuner. If you have no Spells/Traps in your GY while this card is equipped to a monster by its own effect: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Superheavy Samurai Soulgaia Booster" once per turn.
